description: Run tests to validate the implemented JSON plan ingestion and parsing functionality.

instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the AIWhisperer project.
Execute the unit tests for plan ingestion using the command: `pytest tests/unit/test_plan_ingestion.py`.
Execute the integration tests for runner plan ingestion using the command: `pytest tests/integration/test_runner_plan_ingestion.py`.
constraints: Ensure Python environment with project dependencies is activated.
Tests must be run from the root directory of the project.
validation_criteria: The test execution completes without errors.
